questions.q: How can I prevent plant diseases naturally?
questions.a: Use crop rotation, organic compost, and maintain proper spacing between plants to reduce the spread of diseases...

questions.q: What are common signs of plant diseases?
questions.a: Common signs include yellowing leaves, black spots, wilting, and unusual growths...

questions.q: What is the best way to control pests in farming?
questions.a: Integrated Pest Management (IPM), using natural predators, and applying neem oil can help control pests effectively...

questions.q: How can I improve soil fertility naturally?
questions.a: Adding organic matter such as compost, manure, and cover crops can improve soil fertility...

questions.q: What are the benefits of organic farming?
questions.a: Organic farming enhances soil health, reduces chemical exposure, promotes biodiversity, and produces healthier crops...

questions.q: How does climate change affect crop production?
questions.a: Climate change impacts rainfall patterns, temperature, and soil conditions, leading to unpredictable crop yields...

questions.q: What are the most common mistakes farmers make in crop production?
questions.a: Common mistakes include overuse of chemical fertilizers, improper irrigation, neglecting soil testing...

disease.title: Detect Disease
disease.subtitle: Upload your plant's leaf image to identify diseases and get treatment recommendations
disease.why_detect_title: Why is it necessary to detect plant disease?
why_detect_points: It prevents spreading to healthy plants
Minimizes the use of pesticides when caught early
Helps maintain food security and agricultural sustainability
disease.why_detect_desc: Without proper identification of the disease and the disease-causing agent, control measures can be ineffective, wasting time and money while leading to further plant losses. Our AI-powered solution helps detect diseases even before symptoms appear clearly, providing timely interventions.
disease.upload_sub: Simply upload your plant's leaf image and our AI will analyze it instantly
disease.error_no_file: Please select a file to upload.
disease.error_general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
disease.result_healthy: Your plant is healthy! Here's some useful information.
disease.result_diseased: We've detected an issue. Here's what you should know.
